HeatExchanger.h
1 #ifndef AMO_TOOLS_SUITE_HEATEXCHANGER_H
2 #define AMO_TOOLS_SUITE_HEATEXCHANGER_H
3 
4 #include <stdexcept>
5 #include "SteamProperties.h"
6 #include "Header.h"
7 
8 class HeatExchanger {
9 public:
10  struct Output {
11  Output(SteamSystemModelerTool::FluidProperties hotOutlet, SteamSystemModelerTool::FluidProperties coldOutlet)
12  : hotOutlet(hotOutlet), coldOutlet(coldOutlet)
13  {}
14  SteamSystemModelerTool::FluidProperties hotOutlet, coldOutlet;
15  };
22  HeatExchanger(const SteamSystemModelerTool::FluidProperties hotInlet,
23  const SteamSystemModelerTool::FluidProperties coldInlet,
24  const double approachTemp = 20
25  )
26  : hotInlet(hotInlet), coldInlet(coldInlet), approachTemp(approachTemp)
27  {}
28 
29  Output calculate() {
30  auto sp = SteamProperties(
31  hotInlet.pressure, SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity::TEMPERATURE,
32  coldInlet.temperature + approachTemp
33  ).calculate();
34 
35  auto hotOutletTest = SteamSystemModelerTool::FluidProperties(
36  hotInlet.massFlow, hotInlet.massFlow * sp.specificEnthalpy, sp
37  );
38 
39  double heatExchanged = hotInlet.energyFlow - hotOutletTest.energyFlow;
40  // TODO this should be rearranged to not perform a useless calculation
41  sp = SteamProperties(
42  coldInlet.pressure, SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity::ENTHALPY,
43  (coldInlet.energyFlow + heatExchanged) / coldInlet.massFlow
44  ).calculate();
45 
46  auto coldOutletTest = SteamSystemModelerTool::FluidProperties(
47  coldInlet.massFlow, coldInlet.massFlow * sp.specificEnthalpy, sp
48  );
49 
50  if ((hotOutletTest.temperature - coldInlet.temperature) > approachTemp) {
51  sp = SteamProperties(
52  coldInlet.pressure, SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity::TEMPERATURE,
53  hotInlet.temperature - approachTemp
54  ).calculate();
55 
56  coldOutletTest = SteamSystemModelerTool::FluidProperties(
57  coldInlet.massFlow, coldInlet.massFlow * sp.specificEnthalpy, sp
58  );
59 
60  heatExchanged = coldOutletTest.energyFlow - coldInlet.energyFlow;
61  sp = SteamProperties(
62  hotInlet.pressure, SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity::ENTHALPY,
63  (hotInlet.energyFlow - heatExchanged) / hotInlet.massFlow
64  ).calculate();
65 
66  hotOutletTest = SteamSystemModelerTool::FluidProperties(
67  hotInlet.massFlow, hotInlet.massFlow * sp.specificEnthalpy, sp
68  );
69  }
70  return {hotOutletTest, coldOutletTest};
71  }
72 private:
73  SteamSystemModelerTool::FluidProperties hotInlet, coldInlet;
74  const double approachTemp;
75 };
76 
77 #endif //AMO_TOOLS_SUITE_HEATEXCHANGER_H
